      • file_to_array

        public static java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String>> file_to_array(java.lang.String path)
                                                                                throws java.io.FileNotFoundException

        Converts ham.log/spam.log to an array.

        Each position corresponds to an email. Each position then has another array that contains the rules the email breaks.

        Parameters:
        path - to ham.log or spam.log
        Returns:
        array with an array of strings in each position
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException

      • evaluate_solution

        public static java.lang.Double evaluate_solution(int type,
                                                 java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> rules,

                                                 java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String>> result)
        Evaluates the solution returning the total of FP or FN
        Parameters:
        type - 0 for FP, 1 for FN
        rules -
        solution -
        result - of file_to_array() on ham.log (FP) or spam.log (FN)
        Returns:
        total of FP or FN
